body:
The only reason why naruto is in hentai is because he's a lame ass beta bitch who got rejected by women and slapped around by them and put himself in a subservient position in the hopes of winning them over, all of these qualities are relatable to all the weebs who read hentai and that's why they self insert into this character and draw him with women and live vicariously through him and try to avoid their real life where they are messed up pussies spat on by the rest of society . They should all be lynched. Get their entrails ripped out and boiled in oil. 
I can't wait for article 13 to pass and ban all of this shit.
